root.name: The Movie Monster Game
root.description: The player takes on the role of one of six monsters that come with the game, including the likes of Godzilla, a giant spider or a giant robot. The leves are all loosely based on big cities, such as Paris or New York (A total of six) and feature different winning conditions (5 in total), which include destroying a landmark, escaping the map, find and rescue a baby monster, eat as many humans as you can or just destroy everything. The antagonists are the humans (of course) trying to hinder your progress with jets, missiles and tanks.
